1300001: Reveals the hot topic of an interaction.
1300002:
Ensures max vibes when you select a topic
that matches your guest’s hot topic during
an interaction.
1300003:
Attention drops are reduced by [Digit:2digits ]
during an interaction. The lowest number this
drop can reach is zero.
1300004:
Topics that match your guest’s hot topic will
appear more often during an interaction.
